          To be removed with no replacement. 
org.restlet.client.util.Triple

org.restlet.client.resource.UniformResource

Deprecated Methods
org.restlet.client.resource.ClientResource.createRequest(Request)
          Use ClientResource.createRequest() instead 
org.restlet.client.Client.getConnectTimeout()
          Use the equivalent "socketConnectTimeoutMs" connector parameter.

          Use Status.getReasonPhrase() instead. 
org.restlet.client.resource.ClientResource.handle(Request)
          Use the ClientResource.handleOutbound(Request) method instead 
org.restlet.client.Client.setConnectTimeout(int)
          Use the equivalent connector parameters.
